Contact details

To be filled in, at the moment try: b m s @ d e t e r m i n e . o r g . u k

Why ?

Because it was too hard to do.

Why no use Linsig ?

Linsig is very very good. However I did not like the output and it is not Free Software.

What does it not do ?

Lots of things including :-

  • Phase delaying gaining;
  • Type 2/3 appearance;
  • Special conditioning;
  • Variable intergreens;
  • Lots more ...

Although I plan to tackle some of the above and add them a features in the future

I do not like the Logos, headers and footers on the reports

The code is open-source you can change it and run your own copy.

I can set up a separate private website with customized logos, headers and footers for a small fee. Use the contacts link for more details.
